## Log2Node class

Computes the base-2 logarithm

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Log2Node extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns logâ‚‚(x) (logarithm base 2) for x &gt; 0. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
